Class BaseLineSegments

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.BaseLineSegments
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Geometry, GeometryCollection, SegmentCollection
public class BaseLineSegments
extends BaseGeometry
implements SegmentCollection

This implementation is intended for straight line segments only.
